text: Unibuke ubwo bamwe muri bo (bari batuye uwo mudugudu bubahirizaga isabato ariko ntibabibwirize abandi), babwiraga (abayubahirizaga kandi bakanabibwiriza abandi) bati “Kuki mubwiriza abantu Allah agiye kuzoreka (ku isi) cyangwa kuzahanisha ibihano bikomeye (ku munsi w’imperuka)?” (Ababwirizaga) baravuga bati “Turabikora kugira ngo dukiranuke kuri Nyagasani wanyu no kugira ngo babe bagandukira Allah.”
